root.name: Harvey Birdman: Attorney at Law
root.description: Truth, justice, bird seed. These are what Harvey Birdman strives for.Help him unravel the truth as you make your way through cases filled with enough cameos and subversive humor to make you go Yakky Doodle.Habeus Corpus never was this fun, just watch out for flirtatious hippos, flammable street fighters and the RIAA.

similar_games.game: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trials and Tribulations
